first_translate: I think I knew all along...
fiona only accepted me as her partner...

hangle: 어렸을 때 봐왔던 정 때문이었단 걸.
first_translate: ...because she felt sorry for me from when we were young.
she didn’t want to lose me,

hangle: 반짝였던 우리의 어린 시절을 소중히 이어 나가고 싶었기 때문이었다는 것을.
first_translate: and wanted our childhood memories together to continue on forever.
until now,
because I always wanted to stay by your side,
I tried not to think about this too much.
but if my presence is a burden to you,
or causes you pain,
then even at this moment,
right here--
is that why you’re breaking up with me?
why are you doing this?
doesn’t he know already?

hangle: 그러면 시그렌과 만나는 관계가 부담스러운 건가?
first_translate: do you feel uncomfortable seeing him meet other women like that?
well, yes...
that’s how sigren heard what happened between us.
this must be why he wants to break up with me.
if I try to remain calm,
this was exactly what I had hoped would happen.

hangle: 원래의 나는 시그렌을 그저 내가 쓴 소설의 남자주인공으로만 생각했고,
first_translate: in the original story, I thought of sigren merely as the male lead character.
the fact that we became lovers was just temporary,

hangle: 언젠간 원작대로 돌아갈 것이라고 되뇌고 있었어.
first_translate: and I kept telling myself things will go back to normal eventually.
so this makes sense.

hangle: 내심 정해왔던 끝이 마침내 왔을 뿐.
first_translate: it's simply the ending I've been expecting all along.
but still...

hangle: 정말 지금도 시그렌은 내게 원작의 남자 주인공 뿐인 걸까?
first_translate: even now, do I really see sigren as nothing more than the main character of my novel?
fiona,
if my existence becomes a burden to you,
I’ll stop everything right away.
I see...
just as I got hurt by sigren,
he also got hurt by me.

hangle: 이미 정해져 있는 대답을 내가 괜히 물은 걸까.
first_translate: maybe there wasn’t any need for me to ask something so obvious.
alright then.
goodbye,
fiona.
wait.
don’t leave, sigren.
I never meant to hurt you.

hangle: 나를 걱정해서, 나를 좋아하기 때문에 그런 말을 한 걸 알아.
first_translate: I know you said those words out of concern for me and because you care about me.

hangle: 하지만 내가 써 내린 세계에 대한 책임이 있으니 네 걱정을 모른 척했어.
first_translate: but since I have responsibility over the world I created, I pretended not to notice your worries.

hangle: 사실 난 그저. 겁이 난 것뿐일지도 몰라,
first_translate: to tell you the truth, maybe I’m just scared.
as I keep falling deeper into love with you,
I realized that one day, I’d have to let you go.

hangle: 너의 행복을 위한 길은 원작대로 돌아가게 만드는 것이라고 생각하고 또 생각했어.
first_translate: I’ve constantly told myself that returning to the original storyline is the way toward happiness for both of us.
but...
really,
can I truly bear letting you go?
of course not.
now that I realize...

hangle: 내게 아무것도 아니지 않았다는 걸 알았는데.
first_translate: ...the ending I once desired doesn’t mean anything anymore.
I don’t want to part ways with you.
stay with me, sigren.
I don’t want to break up with you.
what’s wrong...?

hangle: 나 때문에 울 정도로 고민하지 마.
first_translate: don’t worry yourself sick over me, fiona.
you shouldn’t cry because of me.
how could I possibly be okay?
no, I can’t.
why are you stopping me?
you weren’t ever a burden to me.
rather, I found myself wanting you more and more each time.

hangle: 네가 이 마음을 알면 부담스러워 할 것 같았어.
first_translate: I figured you might find it burdensome if you came to learn these feelings of mine.
there’s no chance of that happening.
then...
from now on,
let me take control of you.
I promise I won’t scare you off, sigren.
let’s spend the rest of our lives together.
I'll make sure you live happily beside me.
fiona...
haha...
a-are you laughing?!
I'm being serious--!
fiona.

hangle: 어린 시절 네가 나를 위해 울어줬을 때부터
first_translate: starting from the moment you cried for me during our childhood days,
I started liking you from then on.
I like you too.
I won’t run away anymore.

hangle: 걱정도 안 시키고, 네 옆에 꼭 붙어있을 거야
first_translate: I won’t cause you any trouble either. I’ll stick close to you every step of the way.
I’ll get jealous sometimes.

hangle: 상대가 나보다 훨씬 좋은 여자라 해도 순순히 헤어져 주지 않을 거고.
first_translate: even if another woman comes around who’s better than me, I won’t give you up without a fight.
do whatever you wish.
I belong to you.
fiona.

hangle: 너는 항상 나를 잘 가지고 있어야 해.
first_translate: always hold onto me tight.

hangle: 마음속에서 차오르는 기쁨에 질식할 것 같다.
first_translate: my heart feels overwhelmed with joy.
once you start down this path, there’s no turning back.
this is what I wished for.
at last,
nothing can turn back time now.

hangle: 독자님들의 사랑과 관심으로 <내 남자 주인공의 아내가 되었다> 시즌 2가 무사히 마무리되었습니다. 작가님들의 휴식과 재정비 기간을 가지고 더 아름답고 재밌는 시즌 3으로 찾아뵙겠습니다. 앞으로도 많은 기대와 사랑 부탁드립니다. 감사합니다.
first_translate: Dear readers, thank you for showing interest and support throughout Season 2 of “I Became the Wife of My Male Lead.” We hope you enjoyed reading it! With some well-deserved rest and preparation, we look forward to bringing you an even greater Season 3. Thank you again for your continued support! See you next season!
